How the fuck do you install this?

"- Install the update by choosing "repair" when asked" Where the hell does it ask that? Be more specific next time please.
@Brandon187 Use 7 zip to extract through the windows installer(it works). Copy the extracted content in the nba folder and then paste the updated crack in the same folder. Good to go after that.

@viperstrikes

Thanks bro.

Can we connect to online with this? Not to be offensive but the FANiSO's NBA2K11 release can connect online before the patch came out. If this connects online then I'll re-download NBA2K11 again with this scene's release.
does this work on the TPTB nba 2k11 or should i have to DL 2k11 of scene
does this work??? because i followed your instruction to extract through the installer but it failed..it said corrupted archive :(

It works perfectly with TPTB version. All you have to do is open it with 7-zip and you'll see the .msp file in there. Don't unpack, just double click it within 7-zip, and it will show the 10 files included. Backup all of them in your 2k11 folder before replacing. 
Play the game and check if the Cavs court is updated. Done.

@trogglodytes

when i click on the .msi an error shows up "the upgrade patch cannot be installed...." ive tried the official patch too after extracting same message show up.

@kuku09: You're can't install anything, you have to drag and drop files and replace. If you read my post correctly, I said "Don't unpack". If you try to execute it normally as an install file, of course it will fail, because it won't recognize any original file. You have to open the .msp with 7-zip or winRAR (I only tested with 7-zip, but RAR should work too), so you'll see the 10 files inside it. Put all of them inside your nba211 main folder and replace the old ones. (Backup first).

@trogglodytes

guys winrar doesn't work...it finds the files as 0kb and corrupted but 7z does

What am I doing wrong?
